I want the chatbot to understand what I mean, even if I don't phrase things perfectly.
I need the chatbot to give me correct information and actually answer my questions.
I expect the chatbot to get better at understanding me and providing relevant responses as it interacts with more users.
I want the chatbot to be able to adapt to different ways of speaking, whether it's formal or informal.
I want the chatbot to remember my preferences and tailor its responses to my needs.
I need the chatbot to be able to communicate with me in my preferred language.
I want the chatbot to work smoothly with the other apps and services I use.
I expect the chatbot to be available whenever I need it.
I want to understand exactly what I'm paying for and what features are included in each plan.
I need a pricing plan that fits my budget and usage needs.
I want to try the chatbot before I commit to a paid plan.
I want to be able to contact support quickly and easily if I have any problems.
I need the support team to be helpful and resolve my issues efficiently.
